features: Dimensions: 11" x 6.7" x 19.7" (27.9 cm x 17 cm x 50 cm)
body: 210D nylon ripstop with non-PFC durable water-repellent (non-PFC DWR) finish
Concealed rain cover deploys easily and attaches to specific points for a precise fit
Large main compartment holds all your trail needs
External stash pocket holds bulky or quick-access items and compression straps hold items in place
Minimal, two-point trekking-pole attachment to hold poles
Lightweight nylon ripstop keeps pack weight down while the rugged polyester boot provides durability where you need it
Change style name from Alamere 24 to  Basin 24 (7/2/2020).
